text: Select the desired antimicrobials that are be administered during a specified timespan (Start of antimicrobials)
Choose the years you want to analyse using the the slider. You can also drag the slider to move the selection in intervals.

Specialties: By default all specialties and sub-specialties are selected but you can modify the inclusion: 1) Select sub-specialties with a minimum number of patients. 2) Exclude sub-specialties. 3) Include sub-specialties
For analysing diagnostics choose the test from the dropdown menu in the diagnostics section and define the time to the first test.
All changes in the selection criteria need to be confirmed by the clicking the confirm button.
